mapper.insert: insert into hobby(hobby_idx, name, title, content, gender, hobby, img_file_name) values(hobby_seq.nextVal, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gender}, #{hobby}, #{img_file_name} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from hobby where ${skey} like '%'||#{sval}||'%'
mapper.update: update hobby set name=#{name}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, gender=#{gender}, hobby=#{hobby}, img_file_name=#{img_file_name} where hobby_idx=#{hobby_idx}
